channel.title: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)" - Please leave message here or message kibibyte for trade. I am specifically looking for Story Book Pages, Poisoned Daggers and Spirit of the Demon of the Sand

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: kibichan do you still have spare fox rune for trade ?? atm i have golden potion, LLP and NoFH and im willing to trade all of them for the rune (3:1), deal? :)

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Abs, yes I still have a fox rune. Do you want to do the bucket trade tomorrow?

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: I have a bow of windia that I'd like to trade for a Fox rune, if you still have one. Character name is Abs.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Zelman, I actually have all the wheel items. do you have anything else you to trade? I'm still looking for a bow of windia, Poisoned Daggers and Spirit of the Demon of the Sand. But I'll trade for storybook pages :)

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Kibibyte, would you trade your lightning rune for Neckacle of the FH, LLP, or restraining order ?? i also have some money in puppets/ninja dogs

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: @Stark - Its a deal!

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: I offer a snake rune for a lightning one

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Tenchu G, that really sucks that it keeps giving invalid message. Sorry about that. Let me know if you want to try the pigeon method.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
Lets wait till tomorrow for the hacksaw, I have drops/runes if you would trade for both. Check my thread and see if you'd like to make a trade, thanks.

Bucket is set up. Received an invalid offer message, couldn't complete trade.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Tenchu G, I don't need the hacksaw. So I could trade you today for the pokerballs or tomorrow for the hacksaw. Let me know.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: kibichan, I have a bat of casper to trade for that hacksaw (if you don't actually need it), also I would like to trade for pokerballs.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Mailed you the Hacksaw since I didn't have enough appetite for an Avian Attraction Spray.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
Zelman,I've already completed all the wasteland, monochrome, and burger stuff. So I don't really need any items other than the kaiju drops, halloween drops, and a few other special drops.

Jolan, yes, I still have the shiny belt. Let me know if you can trade today.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Kibibyte, do you still have that Shiny Belt? I can give a Hacksaw for it.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
ok so bear coat for wolf rune.. i dont have spare fruit basket ^^' but when i get one ill tell you :) so pm me tomorrow if u can :) im also Zelman ingame:)

ps. anything else i could trade for fox ? (no perms at the moment ;) )

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: It is possible with multiple trades on one single day… you just have to be rather active to swap the tradeies in the trade menu…

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
Soulshaker, trade offer submitted.

Zelman, sure i'll take a bear coat for a wolf rune. If you can get a fruit basket, I'll trade both the fox and the wolf for it. This will have to be for tomorrow though, I don't think its possible to do more than one trade a day.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: hey would you like to trade wolf rune for bear coat? and what would you like for fox rune (i dont have any more perms for trade at the moment :/)

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: open bucket to me

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Soulshaker, I'll trade catgirl entourage for a tire tracks and a k-dogs headband.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: sikcool, sure, i just made a trade today so let me know when you have the goos. Earliest I can trade is tomorrow.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: ok kibichan and im still interested in a make out mood ench

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
I want a lightning or ocelot rune.

I have,

necklace of first hocage
stealth suits
sham rock
groupies

If anyone is interested please PM Theseus in game. and willing to trade any of these.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: sikcool, the 25 goos are for the mood enhancer. i'm trying to save my kaiju items for kaiju drop trades until I at least get a fruit basket.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: I don't have a spare plug suit i'm afraid, 2 lightning runes and a snake rune still for trade though

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
25 glowing goos for the plug suit? ok ill try get em-kibichan

Hey warchariot do you have a plug suit? if you do say wath i can trade for it and we will make the trade tomorrow :)

and yeah kibichan wath about the make out mood enchanter?

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: can we set up trade today for rune trading kibichan?

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: sikcool, maybe 25 goos? looking at the list you posted earlier, i don't think you have much to trade with right now. you may need to wait until you get more items.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: ohh hey wath do you want for a make out mood enchanter kibichan?

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
warchariot do you have a plug suit? because if you do then ill trade wath you want for it it!
when shall we trade? (i have never done a trade before, so do we have to be there at the same time?)

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: I have asked and would be most grateful for it, send you a message in game, problem is I can only trade once a day, it looks like it'll be the day after tommorow if thats ok? I'll mail or contact you here before using the spray

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
yoyo, sure what do you propose trading for the plug suit? i'm not sure what you have available.

qdarthge, i'm actually trying to save my kaiju items so that i can get some of my missing kaiju items. i don't mind helping people out though who are still looking for the runes by trading my extra runes for a kaiju item or another rune + something extra to cover the cost of the potion. but I think warchariot has already asked for my mantis rune.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: @kibichan - would you trade a Wolf Rune for either your Kaiju Memento or Big Mouth or Mantis Rune? Please let me know which trades you would accept.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: im sorry not vs bvs*. hope you reply im gonna bookmark this page and look for a reply

item.content:encoded: my vs name is sikcool

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: I really need a plug suit say something i can trade i dont have so many valuebale items but i have some :)

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded:
@kibichan - I am ready to trade for the money printer…..you can see my bucket. My in-game name is QDarthGE

I am also willing to trade a Regalia, Dartboard, K-Dogs HB, & Wolf Rune for your Tire Tracks. (4:1)

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: Sure that's no problem at all, i'll sort you out something which is worth some money, bout 5k or so, 20 emo rocks CD's are worth more than both of what you're talking about, I actually managed to pick up a fox rune myself yesterday so either rune you would like for the mantis rune and 20 emo rock cd's

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: warchariot … sure, I don't mind helping you out. If possible, could i get a puppet or a dog (something i can sell for money to make up for the potion). running low on money because of my party house gambling addiction.

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: @Kibichan - great! I'll trade with you tomorrow (Jan 16).

item.title: Re: Items for Trade (Monster Drops/Wastland/Perms)
item.content:encoded: I know you seem to have the items, but i've got a LLP, and an ocelot and lightning rune which I would like to trade, maybe for the fox and mantis runes straight 1 for 1 if runes all have the same value? Got no other perms but a few items which could come in handy if you check my other post made today, under the name warchariot, maybe we can help each other out somehow

item.title: Items for Trade
item.content:encoded:

The Glow
Claymore

Kaiju:
- Poisoned Daggers
- Spirit of the Demon of the Sand
